title: Episode 55: The White Rock Machete Murder
description:
Parks are meant to be a tranquil place, lush with trees and welcoming to visitors. But one fateful morning, an innocent man found himself in the wrong park at the wrong time, faced with a violent attacker. Years of untreated mental health issues culminated in this nightmare encounter. Could anything have prevented this brutal attack?
*Note: This audio contains some minor audio/technical issues
